result.html: dar le babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: dar le babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.

result.eng: Where was he all that time?
result.ga: cá raibh sé le fada riamh
result.orig: Cá raibh sé le fada riamh
result.html: cá raibh sé le fada riamhWhere was he all that time?
result.ponchtml: cá raiḃ sé le fada riaṁWhere was he all that time?

result.eng: His teeth were chattering from cold.
result.ga: bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuacht
result.orig: Bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuacht
result.html: bhí a chár á ghreadadh ar a chéile le fuachtHis teeth were chattering from cold.
result.ponchtml: ḃí a ċár á ġreadaḋ ar a ċéile le fuaċtHis teeth were chattering from cold.

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.orig: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu

result.ponchtml: is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
